snippet.title: InnoTab Software: Frozen | VTech Toys UK
snippet.description:
Join your favourite Frozen friends, Anna, Elsa, Olaf, Kristoff, Marshmallow and Sven on their adventures through Arendelle and the story of Frozen, help Anna learn to skate, dodge snowballs with Kristoff or learn rhythm with Elsa. Play through the 5 fun, interactive games, unlock enchanting globes in the snow globe gallery, explore the 5 snowflake activities or read the fun e-book collecting magical snowflakes along the way. Teaches vocabulary, spelling, memory, rhythm and beat, problem solving and reading. Works with InnoTab Max and InnoTV. Requires download for older InnoTab models (internet connection and LL software required).
--

VTech is one of the world's leading toy companies.

VTech, the creator of the Electronic Learning Products (ELP) Category, is a world leader of age-appropriate learning toys.

Since 1976, VTech has been developing high-quality, innovative educational products for children from birth to pre-teen that deliver "smart-play" through the combination of entertaining electronic formats and engaging, age-appropriate content that help children learn while having fun.

VTech is a name that families can always trust for excellent quality standards. All VTech toys are designed with quality in mind to give long lasting, safe play with specially tailored educational values to develop young minds.
